Notes: weapon,melee,dagger,bone. Paired. On a Perfect Hit, a wound attempt in your attack automatically succeeds.
sword,finesse. Unique, Irreplaceable. Add courage to weapon's strength
scimitar, amber. Slow. At the end of each attack, if you wounded the monster, make an additional attack with this weapon. (Note that this is *attack* not *attack roll*.)
weapon,axe,spear, 2H, amber. Reach 2. When a monster collides with you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster suffers 1 wound.
weapon,melee,axe,bone. Paired. Each time you critically wound with this weapon, the monster gains a -1 movement token.
weapon,melee,sword,bone. Paired. Each time you critically wound with this weapon, the monster gains a -1 movement token.
bow,2H. Slow, Range 6. Cumbersome - spend move+action to activate. 0.5-aff-red/0.5-aff-green/1-aff-blue = range +2
weapon,melee,club. On a Perfect Hit, the monster gains a -1 Toughness token until the end of the round (max 1x/round).
Craft: Can only be made after the encounter, and then requires defeating a Lonely Tree to make another.
Location: The Messenger of the First Story encounter

Notes: arrow,bow. Arrow-bow. These upgrade all normal bow shots by adding +1 strength.
1/6/5. Block 2: spend move to ignore 2 hits next time you are attacked (up until your next act). You cannot block more than once per attack. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.
katar,bone. Paired. When you wound with this weapon, monster gains -1 toughness until end of this attack.

2/7+/3 The shield has a myriad of eyes on the front to confuse the opponent. If a trap hit location card is drawn during your attacks, discard it and draw another hit location card. 1x/attack and costs 1 survival to perform. Block 1.
Craft: 1x scarab shell, 1x compound eye, 1x web silk

Notes: 2/7+/4 weapon,shield. Block 1. If holding this shield during an attack (with any weapon) and draw a Trap, roll 1d10. On 6+ the visage distracts the monster and you may discard the trap card (but do not draw a new HL card).
weapon,melee,sword,heavy. On a Perfect Hit, gain +1 survival. If you are a Sword Master, you understand this weapons potential. It gains +20 strength.
1/7+/4 weapon,melee,shield,metal. Block 1. The first time you block a hit each showdown, gain the priority target token. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
weapon,melee,sword,bone. Block 1. When you block with this weapon, gain +1 survival.
weapon,melee,axe,bone. Frail. Savage: 1/attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. Does not apply to impervious hit locations.
weapon,melee,sword,bone. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack.
weapon,melee,dagger,bone. On a Perfect Hit, gain +1 survival.
weapon,ranged,thrown,bone. Range: 6. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack.

item,tool,bone. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack. After Hunt Phase setup, place Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

item,tool,bone. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack. After Hunt Phase setup, place Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.
weapon,melee,axe,other. Paired. Sentient: must be insane to activate. Irreplaceable: When you die, archive this weapon.
melee,katar,pickaxe. Paired, Sharp. During the Mineral Gathering story event, you may reroll one of your d10. This item acts as a pickaxe.
melee,grand,bone,other. Slow, Block 1. This weapon gains +1 strength for each token you have.
melee,grand,2H,bone,heavy. Slow, Deadly. 1x 1-aff-green = Gains Devastating 1.
weapon,melee,dagger,bone. 3-aff-red = on a perfect hit gain +1 strength token. When knocked down, remove all +1 strength tokens.
weapon,ranged,bow,2H. Range: 6. Cumbersome - spend move+action to fire weapon.
weapon,melee,spear,metal. Reach 2. Gain +5 strength when attacking with this weapon if you have a constellation.
item,ammunition,bow,arrow. Slow, requires a bow. If you hit, monster gains -1 evasion token. Usable 1x/showdown.
weapon,melee,axe,2H. Reach 2. 0.5-aff-red = on a perfect hit, do not draw a hit location (monster suffers 1 wound).
melee,axe,scale. 1x 1-aff-blue / 1x 1-aff-red = When attacking from the blind spot, the attack gains +2 strength and the first successful wound attempt gains Devastating 1.
Craft: 1x 1,000 year sunspot, 1x salt, 1x black lens, 1x iron, 1x bone

Notes: melee,katar,pickaxe,bone,mineral. Paired. During the Mineral Gathering story event, you may reroll one of your d10. Acts as a pickaxe.
item,ammunition,arrow. Slow, Ammo-Bow, Devastating 1. If you wound the monster, it suffers knockback 5. Use 1x/showdown per gear card.
weapon,ranged,thrown,bone. Range: 3. If you hit, the monster gains -1 evasion until the end of the round. Limit, 1x/attack.
weapon,melee,grand,2H,heavy,metal. Frail, Slow, Sharp, Devastating 1. Early iron: when an attack roll is a 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.
3/7/0 weapon. Block 1. 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue/1-aff-red = reduce any suffered brain damage by 1, to min of 1. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
weapon,melee,spear,2H. Reach 2. 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue/1-aff-red = if you have +5 survival then gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength.
fistandtooth, fist and tooth. +1 luck when attacking with this weapon.
weapon,melee,stone. Spend action to sling stone for 1 auto-hit and critical wound, then archive the weapon.
weapon,melee,axe,bone. Each showdown, the first time you critically wound the monster, it gains -1 evasion token. 1x 1-aff-red = Gains +1 speed and Savage.
grand,2H,stone. Devastating 1. If your attack roll result is a 1, archive this card and place a Giant Stone Face terrain tile in any adjacent space. May be picked up after the battle.
Craft: after that, hug a big damn rock

Notes: 2H,gloomy,club. Sentient, Reach 2, Deadly. When you wound, end your attack (cancel reactions). Gain the monster controller tile and full move the monster directly away from you.
Craft: Slenderman event. Requires Dark Research II. 3x skull, 1x iron, 1x organ, 3x dark water

Notes: katana,2H,gloomy,finesse. Your insanity is added to this weapon's strength. When Gloom Sheath is right of this in your gear grid, Gloom Katana gains Savage.
Craft: Slenderman event. Requires Dark Research III. 1x iron, 1x crystal mold, 2x dark water

Notes: arrow,gloomy. Ammo-Bow, Cumbersome, Deadly. After attempting to wound each hit location, place the HL card on top of the deck instad of the discard pile. Use 1x/showdown.
Craft: Slenderman event. Requires Dark Research I. 2x bone, 1x dark water

Notes: weapon,melee,axe,2H,heavy. Deadly, Reach 2. 1x 1-aff-green / 1x 1-aff-red = On a Perfect Hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack.
2/7+/4 weapon,shield. Block 1.2/7/4. Shield. Block 1. When you wound with this shield, you may spend 1 survival to add 1 armor to all hit locations. Limit 1x/attack.
Craft: Spidicules, destroy Legless Ball, get shield.

Notes: weapon,set,melee,sword,finesse,bone,metal. Sharp, Deadly, Savage. When you wound, Block 2 free if you have Fetorsaurus.
Craft: Survivor with True Blade fighting art, 1x gormite, 1x stomach lining, 1x calcified juggernaut blade, 1x iron

Notes: 2/4+/7 weapon,melee,shield,metal,heavy. Block 2. When the monster performs Unseen Agony or Meltdown, roll 1d10. On 2+ you suffer no damage. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.
weapon,melee,sword,bone. Frail, Paired. On a perfect hit make 1 additional attack roll.
Slow, ammo-bow. On hit, monster gains -1 movement token. Usable 1x/showdown.
weapon,melee,katar,metal. Paired. If you hit 4+ times in a single attack with this weapon, the monster suffers 1 wound before hit locations are drawn.
weapon,melee,whip,leather. 2x 0.5-aff-blue = on a perfect hit, discard one monster mood in play.
2H,bow. Range: 7, Deadly, Cumbersome. Gains +1 strength for each bleeding token you have. Loses cumbersome when in darkness.
Craft: 1x 3,000 year sunspot, 5x organ, 3x shadow tentacles, 1x iron

Notes: melee,sword,fragile. Reach 3, Deadly 3. You may only attack with this while in darkness.
Craft: 1x 3,000 year sunspot, 4x hide, 1x shadow ink gland, 1x iron

Notes: spear,heavy, 2H. Reach 2.
3/7+/1 Block 1. Once per round, if you wound with this weapon, Block 1 for free. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.
spear,2H,bone. Irreplaceable, Reach 2. Each showdown, first time you wounds, monster gains -1 toughness token.
dagger,finesse,metal. Paired. Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt). Early Iron: when attack roll is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.
spear,axe,2H,finesse,metal. Reach 2. Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt). Early Iron: when an attack roll is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.
2H,spear,other. Reach 2, irreplaceable, unique. After attacking, if standing, you may move up to 2 spaces directly away from monster.
Craft: lose Guidepost innovation, gain Lantern Halberd

Notes: sword,finesse,metal. Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt). Early Iron: when an attack roll is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.
weapon,melee,katar. Deadly (+1 luck with this weapon). Paired: When you attack, add the speed of a 2nd Lion Beast Katar in your gear grid.
Katar. Paired with the LK Right Claw. 1x 0.5-aff-red=Deadly. 1x 0.5-aff-blue=+1 speed
Katar. Paired with the LK Left Claw. 1x 0.5-aff-red=On a perfect hit, gain +1 survival. 1x 0.5-aff-blue=+1 speed

uses whip profiency. Note that manacles cause no wounds. On a successful wound roll, they lower a monster's movement by 3 (for each successful wound roll). Use Whip Proficiency number for the Strength rather than 0. If a survivor carries manacles during an event where another survivor would leave the group or settlement, roll an attack. On success, they are prevented from leaving.
katana,2H,finesse,other. Frail, Sharp, Sentient, Deadly 2, Unique. When you crit wound with this weapon, gain 2 bleeding tokens.
weapon,melee,dagger,nuclear. Spend action: Edge ignites! Suffer 3 brain damage. Your next attack with this weapon gains Devastating 1. Limit 1x/round.
weapon,melee,sythe,2H,nuclear. Reach 2. Spend action: Edge ignites! Suffer 3 brain damage. Your next attack with this weapon gains Devastating 1. Limit, 1x/round.
grand,sword,2H,heavy,finesse,metal. Slow, Sharp Devastating 2, Irreplaceable, -2 movement.
melee,club,2H,bone. Block 1. When you wound with this, you may Block 1 for free and discard 1 mood in play if you have any +1 strength tokens.
Craft: 4x iron, 1x shimmering halo, 2x elder cat teeth

Notes: katana,finesse,2H. Frail. 0.5-aff-red/1-aff-green/1-aff-blue = gains Deadly.
Craft: heat, 1x phoenix beak, 1x rainbow droppings, 1x iron, 6x bone

Notes: 2/6/7 weapon,shield. +2 movement. Block 1. If a move (or dash) is combined with an attack with this shield, then on a successful hit roll 1d10. If the roll is at or below the number of grids moved, then the monster is knocked down. Throw out all HL traps and ignore reactions for the rest of this round.
whip,rawhide. Provoke: when you wound with this weapon, gain priority target token.
weapon,melee,sword,metal. Sharp. Gain +1 speed and +4 strength when attacking with this weapon if you have a constellation.
weapon,melee,grand,sword. Devastating 1. You cannot dodge. 2x 1-aff-green / 1x 1-aff-red = Gains Sharp and +1 Evasion.
weapon,melee,grand,bone. Slow, Deadly.
whip,finesse,metal. Sharp, Reach 2. Early Iron: when an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.
weapon,melee,club. Deadly. When you critically wound, the next time the monster would draw AI, it performs Basic Action instead.
Craft: 1x pure bulb, 1x stout kidney, 1x jiggling lard, 1x dense bone

Notes: 1/8/1 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
dagger,metal. On a perfect hit, gain +2 strength for the rest of the attack.
2/7/3 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
sword,metal. On a perfect hit gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack. 2x 1-aff-red/1-aff-blue = gains Deadly.
whip,silk. 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green = On a Perfect Hit, you may archive a mood in play instead of drawing a random hit location.
2H,heavy,bone. On the first Perfect Hit each attack, this gainst Devastating 1 until the end of the attack. 2x 1-aff-red / 1x 0.5-aff-red = Loses the heavy keyword.
Craft: 2x 1,000 year sunspot, 1x salt, 1x black lense, 1x sunshark bone

Notes: club,bone. On a perfect hit, monster is dazed and gains -1 speed token until end of its turn. Max -1/round.
melee,thrown,spear. Reach 3, Savage. 1x/showdown, if monster is within reach, roll 1d10. On 6+, you skewer it! It suffers 1 wound. Move it up to 3 spaces toward you.
axe,metal. On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll. 0.5-aff-red/2x 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue = gain Savage and Paired.
Craft: 1x small feathers, 1x scrap, 1x hollow wing bone

Notes: 1/6/6 weapon. Irreplaceable. -3 movement. Spend action or 1 survival to ignore a hit. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.
sword,finesse,metal. Irreplaceable, Slow, Sharp. On perfect hit gain +1d10 strength for the rest of the attack.
weapon,ranged,2H,bow,bone. Range: 5. Cumbersome. 2x 0.5-aff-red = On a Perfect Hit, do not draw a hit location, monster suffers 1 wound.
Arrow-bow. Sharp (+1d10 strength/wound attempt). Activation Limit 3x/showdown.
Craft: 3x small sunteeth, 1x bone, 1x sunshark fin, 1x salt

Notes: weapon,melee,ranged,bow,2H. Sharp, Range: 1. 1x 0.5-aff-red / 2x 1-aff-red = Gaints +4 strength and slow.
Craft: 2x huge sunteeth, 1x organ, 1x sunshark bone, 1x salt

Notes: ranged,thrown. Range: 5, Deadly, Activation Limit: 3. When you hit, there is an inspiring flash! Survivors adjacent to the monster gain +1 survival.
weapon,melee,katar,bone. Paired. If all of your attack rolls hit, gain Savage and Deadly until the end of your attack.
sword,amber. When you wound a monster, add 1 armor to a random hit location.
ranged,thrown. Range: 4. At the end of your attack, gain +1 accuracy token for each Perfect Hit. When knocked down, remove all your +1 accuracy tokens.
club,2H,other. Irreplaceable, Unique, Cursed. On perfect hit monster is knocked down. Suffer a severe arm injury. All non-deaf survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

twilightsword,2H,finesse,other. Slow, Cursed, Cumbersome, Sentient, Irreplaceable. Gaints Devastating 2 when fighting the Watcher. *Accuracy is (9-Twilight Sword proficiency level), not 10. Can only use Twilight Sword Weapon Proficiency with this weapon.
item,ammunition,arrow. Ammo - Bow. Deadly 4. Archive after use. If your attack misses, place a Flower Patch terrain tile adjacent to the monster.
weapon,ranged,bow,2H,other. Range 5, Deadly. NOT CUMBERSOME! Before each attack, you may choose for Vespertine Bow to have slow, +4 accuracy, and Range: 9 for that attack.
Craft: 1x osseous bloom, 1x sighing bloom, 1x organ, 1x hide. Add Necrotic Mistletoe (FK) event 4 years from now.

Notes: weapon,melee,sword,fragile. Deadly 2. At the beginning of each settlement phase, archive this unless you spend 1 Flower resource.
club,bone. On perfect hit, reveal next AI card. Place it on top or bottom of AI deck. Unwieldy: if any attack rolls are 1, you hit your self and suffer 1 damage.
weapon,melee,axe,other. This weapon's strength is equal to your current insanity.
grand,2H,bone. Slow, Frail, Deadly (+1 luck). 0.5-aff-red/1-aff-green = Gaints Devastating 1: whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.
